branchCategory.name: Adaptor & Cup-Lateral Entry w/One-touch Fitting
branchCategory.description: <P>The ZP, ZP2 and ZP3 series lateral entry adapters offer a wide variety of cup diameters, materials and designs to suit multiple applications.  The adapters are available with SMC's acclaimed built-in one-touch fittings. Buffer types are available with strokes up to 50mm, depending on the series.  </P>
